data.text: @AtheistIntelli2 I dispise crap like this. In kindergarten, my friend and I both contracted chickenpox. I recovered, she died. I grew up with survivor's guilt, but nothing like the pain in her family who lost a child. When I had children, they were vaxxed for EVERYTHING available. End stupidity!
@AtheistIntelli2 Same.  But Twitter doesn't really care.

@AtheistIntelli2 Thanks.  Fed up with "Dying" being the measure.  For instance, erectile dysfunction is about 6x more likely in a post Covid19 population and major cardio vascular disease including stroke, heart attack. or cardiomyopathy is occurs in 5% within a year.

https://t.co/4K80Zrtkc7
@AtheistIntelli2 If only we could report him for being bad at math too. :/
@AtheistIntelli2 @level6queer @RickWrightNow @MissMia1988 oh, how i'd love that "misleading" option to report covidiots (and all the russian bots at present)

@level6queer @AtheistIntelli2 @RickWrightNow @MissMia1988 thats all i get too on both windows pc and android, as said elesewhere you just get a "didn't break the rules" response from @TwitterSupport on all the options.

@AtheistIntelli2 Chances Mia is a bloody idiot: 200%*

*I never was good at maths...
